string-array.name: service_descriptions
string-array.item: We offer bicycles, wheelchairs and carts in the summer and kick sledges in the winter. All vehicles are available from the gate house.

"Horse and cart rides are available daily at 11:00 - 16:00. There\'s room for up to 10 people in one cart or sleigh. The meeting place is opposite the Kolu Inn.\n\nSUGGESTION! Purchase horse ride ticket combined with museum ticket at museum ticket office and pay less! Combined ticket features a shorter ride. See more here"
We offer audioguides in Estonian, English, Russian, German, Finnish and Swedish languages.
